title: He hit 6 and you won't BELIEVE what happens next
body:
Earlier in the game, this champion was holding his own but was having some troubles killing the enemy ADC with one spell. As soon as he hit 6, all his troubles were gone! Read below to find out why!


---

Feast is broken

Nerf ChOP'Gath, freelo of the void.

replies.body:
NERF THE FREELO OF THE VOID!!! DUUUU EEEEETTTTT!

Mandatory -1 according to board law.
Their fault for getting close enough to get killed by the ridiculously short range ultimate when they're the fucking ADC.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-04T22:59:10.267+0000)
>
> Their fault for getting close enough to get killed by the ridiculously short range ultimate when they're the fucking ADC.

Sounds like you've never dealt with a flash before.
yes which is only up once every 5m and if the ADC's reactions are fast enough, they could flash out of it too before the Cho could click

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-09-04T23:57:08.743+0000)
>
> yes which is only up once every 5m and if the ADC's reactions are fast enough, they could flash out of it too before the Cho could click

Sounds like you don't know anything about ChOP'Gath, then.

(Diamond no backtalk pls thx Bronze 4)
til a diamond is dumber than a b4

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T02:18:28.646+0000)
>
> til a diamond is dumber than a b4

Today everyone learned a B4 is incapable of comprehending sarcasm.

\>Joke
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
\> Your head.

> [{quoted}](name=jaymc1130,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:41:52.120+0000)
>
> Today everyone learned a B4 is incapable of comprehending sarcasm.
> 
> \>Joke
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> .
> \> Your head.

It's both a joke and also the truth. As rude as I sound for saying it, I do honestly think it's funny that he's disagreeing with no  real contradictory evidence (and when he gives it and I counter it, he'll say "Well I said so, so there."

In all seriousness, Cho has such an easy time getting close to people, killing people, dealing tons and tons of damage, never dying, and having tons of AoE and hard CC.

Easy time?
He has to walk to you. His has no gap closers or speed boots.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-05T15:47:36.035+0000)
>
> Easy time?
> He has to walk to you. His has no gap closers or speed boots.

What is his Q, exactly? Have you ever fought a movespeed Cho with Rylai's? How does proto belt work? 

Have you ever dealt with a good Cho player?

His Q is a very telegraphed knock up. It isn't a gap closer, if anything it just helps him get closer. A gap closer just automatically closes the gap (Like Pantheons W). 

Protobelt's cooldown isn't that high for him to use it often. 

Movespeed Cho?  Beyond Luden's I don't see him building many items with movement speed. 

Have I faced a good Cho?  Idk, I haven't seen a Cho in a long time. You think maybe you don't know how to fight him?  It's possible you don't see him much due to his low play rate.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T19:00:05.199+0000)
>
> His Q is a very telegraphed knock up. It isn't a gap closer, if anything it just helps him get closer. A gap closer just automatically closes the gap (Like Pantheons W). 
> 
> Protobelt's cooldown isn't that high for him to use it often. 
> 
> Movespeed Cho?  Beyond Luden's I don't see him building many items with movement speed. 
> 
> Have I faced a good Cho?  Idk, I haven't seen a Cho in a long time. You think maybe you don't know how to fight him?  It's possible you don't see him much due to his low play rate.

Or maybe you'll have to believe me when I say I know what I'm talking about. Maybe you don't think he's broken because you never play against him during to his low play rate? 

You have no idea how ridiculous he is in team fights or following up on an engage or even catching someone from a bush as well as having a beyond God tier landing phase.

A tank good in teamfights?  My god how unorthodox!

We're gonna have to agree to disagree.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T21:15:02.568+0000)
>
> A tank good in teamfights?  My god how unorthodox!

NOM NOM NOM!

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T21:15:02.568+0000)
>
> A tank good in teamfights?  My god how unorthodox!
> 
> We're gonna have to agree to disagree.

Did you imply that Cho would have 5 tank items? Don't be silly.

Be my guest and disagree but disagreeing won't magically make you right >_>

Nor does it make you. 

Plus he's more of a bruiser if he's not full tank.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-05T23:32:19.446+0000)
>
> Nor does it make you. 
> 
> Plus he's more of a bruiser if he's not full tank.

You're supposed to build Cho Tanky AP.

> [{quoted}](name=ChickenWrap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T21:12:48.510+0000)
>
> or even catching someone from a bush

eheheheheheheh... I _may_ have done that to unsuspecting ADC's a few times as Cho.  I do ask if I can nom them before doing it, but they can't say no when they're silenced.

> [{quoted}](name=4maskwolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-06T05:05:07.531+0000)
>
> eheheheheheheh... I _may_ have done that to unsuspecting ADC's a few times as Cho.  I do ask if I can nom them before doing it, but they can't say no when they're silenced.

"Cho'Gath is balanced" - Delusional Bronze Players
I don't have a high expectation of intelligence from most people so I assumed it wasn't.

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:57:28.111+0000)
>
> I don't have a high expectation of intelligence from most people so I assumed it wasn't.

You should start. It might help you climb to believe your team mates are smarter than you think.
I mean I'm not playing to climb in the first place. I just like relaxing and having fun in Normals.

> [{quoted}](name=ChickenWrap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-09-04T23:25:35.343+0000)
>
> Sounds like you've never dealt with a flash before.

Isn't there a champion who can get a pentakill by flashing and using his ult? Despite that, isn't he still (somewhat) balanced? {{champion:3}} 

Then again, he's going to be removed from the game soon, so I suppose maybe he isn't balanced. Idk. NERF GALIOP?

FREELO GARGOYLE

> [{quoted}](name=ChickenWrap,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000400000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:58:47.164+0000)
>
> FREELO GARGOYLE

Agreed. Unlike Cho'Gath, though, Galio will be removed from the game in a few months. Then again, Riot has said Cho'Gath was on the list, too. Maybe someday your dreams will come true.

> [{quoted}](name=haaaaaaaalp,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-09-05T01:39:20.268+0000)
>
> Oh damn it. Did someone forget to fix the leak from GD again?

You know I'm right though.
Shit happens when you feed chogath silly.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-04T21:38:28.698+0000)
>
> Shit happens when you feed chogath silly.

Only one way to get fed. 

Killing people.
buff chOPgath pls ty
He can nuke one person with flash protobelt.  Annie can nuke 5 with flash protobelt.  I'd rather be against Cho than Annie.

> [{quoted}](name=DemainaNyx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-06T03:42:28.058+0000)
>
> He can nuke one person with flash protobelt.  Annie can nuke 5 with flash protobelt.  I'd rather be against Cho than Annie.

I mean, His Q is a 1:1 AoE AP ratio with a knock-up, his W is a 2.5 second AoE silence? I'd rather fight Annie. At least you stand a chance to kill her.
It's a poorly designed ability, but Cho isn't exactly difficult to deal with.  Especially with the mobility/%hp/damage meta flying around these days.

> [{quoted}](name=Wanfear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-09-05T05:57:15.033+0000)
>
> It's a poorly designed ability, but Cho isn't exactly difficult to deal with.  Especially with the mobility/%hp/damage meta flying around these days.

Sounds like you don't fight many decent Cho'Gaths.
It's a pretty weak ultimate, only really good for dueling or executing an already weak enemy.

> [{quoted}](name=Requiemsfire,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-09-05T03:33:41.944+0000)
>
> It's a pretty weak ultimate, only really good for dueling or executing an already weak enemy.

Wut. That shit deals 800+ True Damage with two AP items.

Yes, it does deal a butt ton of true  damage at melee range but unlike other ultimate abilities it simply isn't exactly fantastic for team fights unlike other ultimates some of which can be game changing all on its own.

> [{quoted}](name=Requiemsfire,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rgWBRjE4,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2016-09-05T05:54:36.290+0000)
>
> Yes, it does deal a butt ton of true  damage at melee range but unlike other ultimate abilities it simply isn't exactly fantastic for team fights unlike other ultimates some of which can be game changing all on its own.

It literally deleted your health bar. Not good in teamfights? It chunks tanks like mad and OHKO's mids/ADCs.
ChoP"Gath has lived the good life for too long, nerfs so your children don't have to see him!
Gut the freelo monster
